com.jogamp.opencl.llb.gl

Interface CLGL

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CL, CLBufferBinding, CLCommandQueueBinding, CLContextBinding, CLDeviceBinding, CLEventBinding, CLImageBinding, CLKernelBinding, CLMemObjBinding, CLPlatformBinding, CLProgramBinding, CLSamplerBinding
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLAbstractImpl, CLImpl

    public interface CLGL
extends CL
    Java bindings to OpenCL, the Open Computing Language. OpenGL - OpenCL interoperability.
    Author:
    Michael Bien, GlueGen, et al.
